data.content:
verb
-cates; -cated; -cating
[+ obj] to teach (someone) to do or understand something in a new way
The program reeducates people about how to eat in a more healthful way.
(disapproving) camps that were used to reeducate political prisoners [=to force political prisoners to accept the official ideas and beliefs of the government]
to train (someone) for a different job
We need to reeducate the workers who lost their jobs when the factory closed.

Động từ
giáo dục lại
we must reeducate people to eat more healthily
chúng ta phải giáo dục lại mọi người cách ăn uống sao cho có lợi cho sức khỏe hơn
